title: MiMeMo.tools 0.4.0
text: 24/02/2022 characterise_flows gains precision argument decrease gap sample points. new check also tests whether sampling points different polygons, fails offending points returned. characterise_flows bug fix swapping st_line_sample st_centroid. box_zoom lets control ggplot plotting window bounding box sf object. NM_volume_summary gains switch ignore ice variables ice_mod files weren’t processed. Updated pkgdown site V2 styling match group landing page.

title: MiMeMo.tools 0.3.1

title: MiMeMo.tools 0.2.1

title: MiMeMo.tools 0.2.0

title: MiMeMo.tools 0.1.0
